analysis.description:
MainassetPreICO.claimRefund (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#486-497) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0)

Reentrancy in MainassetPreICO.finalize (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#458-464):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#461)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#462)

MainassetPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#395-411) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#408)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_wallet' of RefundVault.RefundVault (/unique_chucks/34/0xfa30a0fc2b75d5ec572da0811b6d90a0d1d0fd4a.sol#99-102) is not in mixedCase
